text: How much would you donate to the children's charity?
how about a dollar?
Every dollar counts for the charity to help the childrens. Do you think you can donate a bit more?
Well, I figured i would at least keep a dollar to myself
I understand but these are children, it would help them out very much. Every dollar counts.
I think a dollar is enough.
Ok, if you say you'll donate a dollar that will be fine. I'm really glad you decided to donate.
No problem.
The research team will collect all donations and send it to Save the Children, so thank you!
awesome, no problem.  Good luck.
And good luck.
How do I end the chat?
I think we need to do atleast 10 inputs, the one before I counted 7.
Oh crap. okay.  This is tough since we've already reached an agreement lol.
Well I guess there's a few more information I forgot to mention. (2 more input to go).
Okay, what else is there?
I forgot to link the website to Save the Children  URL
Alright, I'll check it out.
Sounds good I hope the website helps out.
i think when i have some more money, and I'm not so broke, I'll donate more in the future.
